items.title: iPhone 17 Pro 将在三个月内发布，带来这12项新功能 (原标题: iPhone 17 Pro Launching in Three Months With These 12 New Features)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### iPhone 17 Pro 传闻中的12项新功能

据传闻，iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 将在未来三个月内发布。以下是截至2025年6月，关于iPhone 17 Pro型号的一些关键变化传闻汇总：

![iPhone 17 Pro 蓝色特写](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-fm_i9BhwB88TYBcouDJHKiazOs=/400x0/article-new/2025/04/iPhone-17-Pro-Blue-Feature-Tighter-Crop.jpg?lossy)

1.  **铝制边框**：iPhone 17 Pro型号预计将采用铝制边框，取代iPhone 15 Pro和iPhone 16 Pro的钛金属边框，以及iPhone X至iPhone 14 Pro的不锈钢边框。设备背面据称将采用全新的“部分铝制，部分玻璃”设计。
2.  **矩形摄像头凸起**：iPhone 17 Pro型号预计将采用一个带有圆角的较大矩形摄像头凸起。苹果似乎计划继续采用三角形排列的后置摄像头镜头。
3.  **天蓝色配色**：与最新的MacBook Air类似，iPhone 17 Pro型号据传将提供天蓝色选项。
4.  **更大电池**：据传iPhone 17 Pro Max将采用略厚的机身设计，以容纳更大的电池。
5.  **A19 Pro芯片**：iPhone 17 Pro型号预计将采用苹果下一代A19 Pro芯片，据报道将采用台积电更新的第三代3纳米工艺制造。预计将带来适度的年度性能提升和功耗效率改进。
6.  **苹果自研Wi-Fi 7芯片**：所有四款iPhone 17型号都将配备苹果而非博通设计的Wi-Fi 7芯片。
7.  **2400万像素前置摄像头**：所有四款iPhone 17型号都将配备升级的2400万像素前置摄像头，而所有iPhone 16型号都配备1200万像素前置摄像头。
8.  **4800万像素后置长焦摄像头**：iPhone 17 Pro型号据传将配备升级的4800万像素长焦摄像头，高于iPhone 16 Pro型号的1200万像素长焦摄像头。
9.  **双向视频录制**：据Jon Prosser透露，iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max将允许用户在相机应用中同时使用前置和后置摄像头录制视频。
10. **8K视频录制**：苹果据称在iPhone 16 Pro型号上测试过8K视频录制，但该功能尚未推出。鉴于iPhone 17 Pro型号预计将全面配备4800万像素后置摄像头，8K视频录制可能会在这些设备上首次亮相。
11. **12GB内存**：iPhone 17 Pro型号甚至iPhone 17 Air据传将配备12GB内存。此升级应有助于提升Apple Intelligence的性能和多任务处理能力。所有四款iPhone 16型号都配备8GB内存。
12. **改进的散热**：所有四款iPhone 17型号据传将进行内部设计更改，以实现更好的散热。Pro型号还传闻将采用均热板散热系统。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max预计将在三个月内发布，带来多项重大升级。主要亮点包括：回归铝制边框、新的矩形摄像头模组、天蓝色选项、Pro Max更大的电池、A19 Pro芯片、苹果自研Wi-Fi 7芯片、升级至24MP前置和48MP后置长焦摄像头。此外，还可能支持双向和8K视频录制，内存增至12GB，并改进散热系统。

images.alt: iPhone 17 Pro Blue Feature Tighter Crop

items.content:
The iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max are three months away, and there are plenty of rumors about the devices.


Below, we recap key changes rumored for the iPhone 17 Pro models as of June 2025:
  • Aluminum frame: iPhone 17 Pro models are rumored to have an aluminum frame, whereas the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro models have a titanium frame, and the iPhone X through iPhone 14 Pro have a stainless steel frame. The back of the devices will supposedly have a new "part-aluminum, part-glass" design.

  • Rectangular camera bump: iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to have a large rectangular camera bump with rounded corners. Apple apparently plans to stick with a triangular arrangement for the rear camera lenses.

  • Sky Blue finish: Like the latest MacBook Air, the iPhone 17 Pro models are rumored to be available in a Sky Blue color.

  • Larger battery: The iPhone 17 Pro Max is rumored to have a slightly thicker design that allows for a larger battery.

  • A19 Pro chip: iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to use Apple's next-generation A19 Pro chip, which will reportedly be manufactured with TSMC's newer third-generation 3nm process. Like usual, expect modest year-over-year performance gains and power efficiency improvements compared to the current iPhones.

  • Apple-designed Wi-Fi 7 chip: All four iPhone 17 models are rumored to get a Wi-Fi 7 chip designed by Apple rather than Broadcom.

  • 24-megapixel front camera: All four iPhone 17 models are said to feature an upgraded 24-megapixel front-facing camera, whereas all iPhone 16 models are equipped with a 12-megapixel front-facing camera.

  • 48-megapixel rear Telephoto camera: An upgraded 48-megapixel Telephoto camera is rumored for the iPhone 17 Pro models, up from the 12-megapixel Telephoto camera on iPhone 16 Pro models.

  • Dual video recording: According to Jon Prosser, of the YouTube channel Front Page Tech, the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max will allow users to record video with the front and rear cameras simultaneously in the Camera app.

  • 8K video recording: Apple allegedly tested 8K video recording on the iPhone 16 Pro models, but such functionality is still not available. With the iPhone 17 Pro models expected to have entirely 48-megapixel rear cameras, perhaps 8K video recording will debut on those devices.

  • 12GB of RAM: iPhone 17 Pro models, and even the iPhone 17 Air, are rumored to have 12GB of RAM. This upgrade should help to improve the performance of Apple Intelligence and multitasking. All four iPhone 16 models have 8GB of RAM.

  • Improved cooling: All four iPhone 17 models are rumored to feature internal design changes that result in better heat dissipation. A vapor chamber cooling system has been rumored for the Pro models.
Check out our iPhone 17 Pro roundup for even more rumors.

items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
# AirPods 优惠信息

*   **AirPods Pro 2 优惠：** 亚马逊本周末将 AirPods Pro 2 降价至 **169.00 美元**，原价 249.00 美元。这是 2025 年迄今为止追踪到的最佳价格，也是 AirPods Pro 2 整体第二好的价格。
    *   预计送达日期约为 6 月 19 日，Prime 会员通常会更快收到。
    *   ![Airpods Pro 2 Discount Feature Blue Triad](https://images.macrumors.com/t/NFWL7zSE-1vZZeA90etBmu3Lym0=/400x0/article-new/2023/05/Airpods-Pro-2-Discount-Feature-Blue-Triad.jpg?lossy)
*   **AirPods 4 优惠：** 亚马逊在此次促销活动中还将 AirPods 4 降价至 **99.00 美元**，创下历史新低。

*   **附属合作声明：** MacRumors 是亚马逊的附属合作伙伴。通过链接购买可能会获得少量佣金，以支持网站运营。

# 其他 Apple 相关新闻精选

以下是过去一周 MacRumors 网站上的一些热门 Apple 相关新闻：

*   **iPad 为何不运行 macOS：** Apple 解释了 iPad 不直接运行 macOS 的原因。Apple 软件工程主管 Craig Federighi 在采访中表示，尽管 iPadOS 26 引入了新的应用窗口系统和屏幕顶部菜单栏等 Mac 般的功能，但 Apple 仍未允许 iPad 运行 macOS。
*   **等待 iPhone 17 的理由：** 文章探讨了等待 iPhone 17 系列的多个原因，提及 Apple 的开发路线图以及 2025 年智能手机系列可能带来的新功能。
*   **罗技发布 WWDC 新配件：** 罗技在 WWDC 期间发布了两款针对 iPad 和 Apple Vision Pro 的新配件，其中包括专为 Apple Vision Pro 开发的空间追踪触控笔 Logitech Muse，旨在支持 visionOS 26 带来的下一代空间计算工作流程。
*   **iPhone 17 Pro 传闻功能：** 距离 iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 发布还有三个月，有传闻称 iPhone 17 Pro 型号将采用铝制边框，而 iPhone 15 Pro 和 iPhone 16 Pro 型号则采用钛金属边框。
*   **iOS 26 特定功能要求：** iOS 26 引入了多项重大更新，但其中一些功能（如依赖 Apple Intelligence 的功能）仅限于 iPhone 15 Pro 或更新机型，因为它们依赖于设备上的大型语言模型和机器学习。
*   **CarPlay 视频播放功能：** Apple 宣布 iPhone 用户很快将能够在支持的 CarPlay 屏幕上观看视频。出于安全考虑，视频播放仅在车辆停泊时可用，通过 AirPlay 无线传输。
*   **调整 iOS 26 “Liquid Glass”设计：** 如果用户不喜欢 iOS 26 的“Liquid Glass”设计或觉得可读性有问题，文章提供了通过辅助功能选项调整透明度的方法。
*   **翻新 Mac Studio 上架：** Apple 已在其在线认证翻新商店中首次上架搭载 M4 Max 和 M3 Ultra 芯片的 Mac Studio 型号，提供约 15% 的折扣。
*   **iOS 26 开发者测试版修订：** Apple 发布了 iOS 26 首个开发者测试版的修订版本，以修复电池问题。此更新仅适用于 iPhone 15 和 iPhone 16 型号。

items.title: 头条新闻：WWDC 2025回顾，包括iOS 26、macOS Tahoe等 (原标题: Top Stories: WWDC 2025 Recap With iOS 26, macOS Tahoe, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
# WWDC 2025 大会回顾：iOS 26、macOS Tahoe 及更多

苹果年度开发者大会WWDC 2025已圆满落幕，大会从周一的主题演讲开始便发布了大量公告。正如预期，苹果平台采用了统一的编号方案，并进行了重新设计，以提供更具凝聚力的体验。

![WWDC 2025 概览](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_dYrXNJwnqSxMBVz01XaFv_VCEA=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/top-stories-2025-06-14.jpg?lossy)

除了重新设计，苹果的所有操作系统都增加了大量新功能和改进。开发者现在可以访问测试版，为今年晚些时候新操作系统版本的公开发布做好准备。

## WWDC 2025 主要公告概览

本次WWDC 2025主题演讲活动中，苹果揭示了将影响未来十年iOS、iPadOS和macOS开发的新设计理念。

![WWDC 2025 总结](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kGYalHesSk7R7OV5tPYoe4Cfzo0=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/Everything-WWDC25-Thumb-3.jpg?lossy)

*   **统一设计语言**：引入了名为“Liquid Glass”（液态玻璃）的全新视觉设计概念，该概念贯穿于多个操作系统中。Liquid Glass是一种半透明材料，能够反射和折射周围环境，创建动态、响应式的界面元素。
*   **苹果智能（Apple Intelligence）**：在多个操作系统中扩展了其能力。
*   **开发者测试版**：所有新操作系统版本的测试版已向开发者开放。

## 各平台更新亮点

### 1. iOS 26：液态玻璃设计与更多功能

苹果在WWDC上发布了iOS 26，引入了围绕“Liquid Glass”概念构建的全面视觉重新设计，同时扩展了Apple Intelligence功能，并更新了核心通信应用。

![iOS 26 英雄图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/g-uEnr4EJRWmw7C5nq55_EyKJMs=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/Apple-WWDC25-iOS-26-hero-250609.jpg?lossy)

*   **设计革新**：
    *   锁屏时间会根据壁纸可用空间流畅调整。
    *   空间场景在用户移动iPhone时增加3D效果。
    *   应用图标和小组件获得新的自定义选项，包括引人注目的透明外观。
*   **新功能**：
    *   实时翻译（Live Translation）。
    *   电话应用（Phone App）全面 overhauled。

### 2. macOS Tahoe 26：与iOS 26同步的设计与集成

苹果本周在WWDC 2025上发布了macOS Tahoe 26，引入了引人注目的视觉重新设计，同时扩展了Apple Intelligence功能和新的连续互通（Continuity）功能，进一步整合了Mac和iPhone的工作流程。

![macOS Tahoe](https://images.macrumors.com/t/MXHDXNQlNAt8xrNcZB22Efc41hg=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/macos-tahoe.jpg?lossy)

*   **设计革新**：
    *   与iOS 26类似，采用“Liquid Glass”设计。
    *   Dock、侧边栏和工具栏经过优化，以突出内容。
    *   完全透明的菜单栏使显示屏感觉更大。
*   **个性化选项**：
    *   多彩的应用图标色调。
    *   可自定义的文件夹颜色与表情符号。
    *   增强的控制中心布局。
*   **新功能**：
    *   电话应用（Phone App）。
    *   实时翻译（Live Translation）。

### 3. watchOS 26：液态玻璃、健身伙伴与智能叠放

苹果在WWDC上发布了watchOS 26，将iOS 26的“Liquid Glass”设计语言带到手腕上，同时提供了一项新的AI驱动健身功能“Workout Buddy”和更新的智能叠放（Smart Stack）功能。

![watchOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/sbc2xYoHiZfixtcDK7RLUnQNr2M=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/watchOS-26-Apple-Newsroom.jpg?lossy)

*   **设计革新**：
    *   Liquid Glass设计体现在智能叠放小组件、控制中心、通知和应用内导航中。
    *   照片表盘上的数字也由Liquid Glass制成，通过显示屏展示更多用户照片。
*   **新功能**：
    *   **Workout Buddy（健身伙伴）**：利用Apple Intelligence分析锻炼数据和健身历史，在锻炼期间提供语音激励。
    *   **Smart Stack（智能叠放）**：新增提示功能，利用上下文数据、传感器信息和日常模式提供可操作的建议，如在偏远地区提示“回溯”或在到达健身地点时提供锻炼建议。

### 4. tvOS 26：Apple TV 的新特性

苹果本周发布了tvOS 26，现已提供开发者测试版。此更新为Apple TV带来了一些新功能，但部分更改仅适用于较新型号。

![tvOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/OLncK0GPeIy8dR-1GkmkBm-w06w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/tvOS-26-Apple-Newsroom.jpg?lossy)

*   **设计革新**：
    *   引入“Liquid Glass”设计（闪亮的应用图标和反射颜色的半透明元素），但**仅适用于Apple TV 4K（第二代）和Apple TV 4K（第三代）**。
*   **其他新功能**：
    *   唤醒时可选的用户配置文件选择屏幕。
    *   可将iPhone用作Apple Music Sing的麦克风。
    *   FaceTime改进。
    *   新的空中屏保。

### 5. visionOS 26：空间小组件与增强人物形象

苹果在WWDC上发布了visionOS 26，为Apple Vision Pro用户带来了空间小组件、显著改进的人物形象（Personas）和新的协作体验。

![visionOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CW73g6e2oyZhZNULIAgtnnL7edU=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/visionos-26.jpg?lossy)

*   **空间小组件**：
    *   将小组件（如时钟、天气、音乐、照片）转换为空间对象，无缝融入用户的物理环境。
    *   这些可自定义的小组件在用户每次佩戴Vision Pro时都会在空间中保持不变。
    *   用户可以用全景图、空间照片、独特的时钟面和快速访问Apple Music播放列表来装饰周围环境。
    *   新的“小组件”应用有助于发现兼容的iOS和iPadOS应用小组件。
*   **人物形象（Personas）**：
    *   获得最显著的升级，利用体积渲染和机器学习实现惊人的表现力和清晰度。
    *   增强的头像现在显示完整的侧面轮廓，并具有极其准确的头发、睫毛和肤色细节。
*   **协作体验**：引入了新的协作功能。

## MacRumors 新闻通讯

文章末尾提到了MacRumors新闻通讯，旨在每周通过电子邮件提供苹果热门故事的摘要，帮助用户获取关键信息和相关故事的宏观视图。
items.shortSummary: WWDC 2025大会发布了苹果各平台的重大更新。所有操作系统采用统一编号，并引入了“Liquid Glass”视觉设计。iOS 26、macOS Tahoe 26、watchOS 26、tvOS 26和visionOS 26均获得新功能，包括扩展的Apple Intelligence、实时翻译、健身伙伴、空间小组件和改进的人物形象。开发者测试版已发布，预示着今年晚些时候的公开发布。
items.translated_title: 头条新闻：WWDC 2025回顾，包括iOS 26、macOS Tahoe等
items.content:
Apple's annual developer conference has come to a close for 2025, and WWDC was packed with announcements right from the start of Monday's keynote. As expected, we got a unified numbering scheme across Apple's platforms, as well as a redesign that makes for a more cohesive experience.


Alongside the redesigns, all of Apple's operating systems are also seeing a host of feature additions and improvements, and developers are able to access beta versions now to help get their apps ready for a public release of the new operating system versions later this year. Read on below for a high-level overview of Apple's WWDC announcements!

Everything Apple Announced at WWDC 2025 in 10 Minutes


At this week's WWDC 2025 keynote event, Apple unveiled a new design that will inform the next decade of iOS, iPadOS, and macOS development, so needless to say, it was a busy day. Apple also unveiled a ton of new features for the iPhone, an overhauled Spotlight interface for the Mac, and a ton of updates that make the iPad more like a Mac than ever before.


Apple's event lasted for an hour and a half, but we've recapped all of the announcements in a 10-minute video, just in case you don't want to sit through the entire spiel. We've also rounded up all of our coverage from the day, so you can dive deeper into any of the new features, while Dan and Hartley sat down with Kevin Nether at Apple Park for an on-location episode of The MacRumors Show discussing Apple's announcements.

Apple Announces iOS 26 With 'Liquid Glass' Design, Live Translation, Overhauled Phone App, and More


Apple at WWDC announced iOS 26, introducing a comprehensive visual redesign built around its new "Liquid Glass" concept, alongside expanded Apple Intelligence capabilities, updates to core communication apps, and more.


Liquid Glass is a translucent material that reflects and refracts surroundings to create dynamic, responsive interface elements, according to Apple. The new design language transforms the Lock Screen, where the time fluidly adapts to available space in wallpapers, and spatial scenes add 3D effects when users move their iPhone. Meanwhile, app icons and widgets gain new customization options, including a striking clear appearance.

Apple Unveils macOS Tahoe With Liquid Glass Design, Phone App, Live Translation, and More


Apple this week announced macOS Tahoe 26 at WWDC 2025, introducing a striking visual redesign alongside expanded Apple Intelligence capabilities and new Continuity features that further integrate Mac and iPhone workflows.


Similar to iOS 26, macOS Tahoe updates center around what Apple calls a "gorgeous new design" built with Liquid Glass, a translucent material that reflects surrounding elements. The Dock, sidebars, and toolbars have been refined to emphasize content, while a completely transparent menu bar makes displays feel larger. Users gain extensive personalization options, including colorful app icon tints, customizable folder colors with emoji symbols, and enhanced Control Center layouts.

Apple Announces watchOS 26 With Liquid Glass Design, Workout Buddy, and Smart Stack Intelligence


Apple announced watchOS 26 at WWDC, carrying over the "Liquid Glass" design language from iOS 26 to the wrist while delivering a new AI-powered fitness feature called Workout Buddy and updated Smart Stack functionality.


Liquid Glass uses real-time rendering to create translucent interface elements that reflect and refract content. The design appears across Smart Stack widgets, Control Center, notifications, and in-app navigation. The Photos watch face also receives numerals made of Liquid Glass, showing more of users' photos through the display.

Workout Buddy uses Apple Intelligence to analyze workout data and fitness history, providing spoken motivation during exercise sessions, while the Smart Stack adds a hints feature using contextual data, sensor information, and routine patterns for actionable suggestions. These appear as visual prompts on the display, such as Backtrack in remote locations or workout suggestions when arriving at fitness locations.

tvOS 26 Adds These New Features to Your Apple TV


Apple this week announced tvOS 26, which is now available in developer beta. The upcoming software update includes a handful of new features for the Apple TV, although some of the changes are only available on newer models.


The most obvious change is the new Liquid Glass design, which was also introduced across iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26, and watchOS 26. The new design language includes shimmery app icons, and translucent elements that reflect colors. The new design is only visible on the Apple TV 4K (2nd generation) and Apple TV 4K (3rd generation).

Other new features in tvOS 26 include an optional new user profile selection screen at wake-up, the ability to use an iPhone as a microphone for Apple Music Sing, FaceTime improvements, new Aerial screen savers, and more.

visionOS 26 Announced With Spatial Widgets, Shared Experiences, Enhanced Personas, and More


Apple at WWDC announced visionOS 26, bringing spatial widgets, dramatically improved Personas, and new collaborative experiences to Apple Vision Pro users.


Apple says the update transforms widgets into spatial objects that integrate seamlessly into users' physical environments. These customizable widgets — including Clock, Weather, Music, and Photos — offer unique interactions and persist in space each time users don Vision Pro. Users can decorate their surroundings with panoramas, spatial photos, distinctive clock faces, and quick access to Apple Music playlists. The new Widgets app helps discover compatible widgets from iOS and iPadOS apps, according to Apple.

Elsewhere, Personas receive their most significant upgrade yet, leveraging volumetric rendering and machine learning for striking expressivity and sharpness. The enhanced avatars now display full side profiles with remarkably accurate hair, lashes, and complexion details.

items.title: 苹果针对2023款Mac mini的电源问题推出维修计划 (原标题: Apple Launches 2023 Mac Mini Repair Program Due to Power Issue)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果推出2023款Mac mini电源问题维修计划

苹果公司今日宣布，针对搭载M2芯片的Mac mini机型启动一项维修计划。此举是由于苹果发现“极小比例”的此类电脑可能出现无法开机的问题。请注意，此维修计划仅限于搭载M2芯片的Mac mini机型，不涉及其他Mac mini型号。

![Mac mini M2 2023](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Y_5vl-5g9W6YpSgn9IBlD9U0E9I=/400x0/article-new/2023/01/Mac-mini-M2-2023.jpeg?lossy)

**计划详情：**

*   **问题描述**：受影响的Mac mini设备可能出现无法正常开机的情况。
*   **资格查询**：如果您的Mac mini出现此问题，您可以在苹果官方网站输入其序列号，以查询设备是否符合此维修计划的条件。
*   **维修服务**：如果设备符合条件，苹果公司或其授权服务提供商将免费提供维修服务。
*   **受影响设备制造日期**：尽管搭载M2芯片的Mac mini机型于2023年首次发布，但苹果表示，受影响的设备是在2024年6月16日至11月23日期间制造的。
*   **计划覆盖范围**：这项全球性维修计划将为符合条件的Mac mini提供自购买之日起最长三年的免费服务。
*   **问题原因**：苹果公司未就导致此电源问题的原因提供具体说明。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已为部分搭载M2芯片的Mac mini机型启动全球免费维修计划，以解决极少数设备可能无法开机的问题。受影响的设备制造于2024年6月16日至11月23日之间，用户可在苹果官网查询序列号以确认资格。该计划提供自购买之日起最长三年的免费服务。苹果未说明电源问题的原因。
items.translated_title: 苹果针对2023款Mac mini的电源问题推出维修计划
items.content:
Apple today launched a repair program for Mac mini models with the M2 chip, after it determined that a "very small percentage" of these computers may no longer power on. No other Mac mini models are part of this program.


If your Mac mini has exhibited this issue, you can enter its serial number on Apple's website to see if it is eligible for this program. If it is, Apple or an Apple Authorized Service Provider will provide service, free of charge.

Mac mini models with the M2 chip were first released in 2023, but Apple says that affected units were manufactured between June 16 and November 23 of 2024.

The worldwide program covers an eligible Mac mini for up to three years after it was purchased.

Apple did not provide a reason for the power issue.

items.title: iOS 26 中视觉智能的新功能 (原标题: Here's What's New With Visual Intelligence in iOS 26)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iOS 26 中视觉智能的新功能

苹果在去年推出的 Apple Intelligence 功能“视觉智能”（Visual Intelligence）在 iOS 26 中获得了多项新能力，使其更加实用，并能更好地与部分安卓智能手机的功能竞争。

![visual lookup ios 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TAxNLC58qhvWM0cAvRJF3tz07GY=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/visual-lookup-ios-26.jpg?lossy)

### 屏幕内容识别 (Onscreen Awareness)

在 iOS 18 中，视觉智能仅限于与相机配合使用，但在 iOS 26 中，它也能识别设备屏幕上的内容。用户可以截取屏幕截图，然后利用视觉智能来识别屏幕上的内容、查找图像并通过 ChatGPT 获取更多信息。

**如何使用屏幕内容识别：**

*   屏幕截图的视觉智能功能与相机应用中的视觉智能功能大致相同，但它位于屏幕截图界面中。
*   截取屏幕截图（按住音量调高按钮和侧边按钮）。
*   如果显示“标记”界面，请点击退出（默认视图）。要退出“标记”，请点击显示屏顶部的笔形小图标。
*   之后，您应该会看到视觉智能的选项。

### 划线搜索 (Highlight to Search)

通过视觉智能的屏幕内容识别功能中的“划线搜索”，用户可以用手指在屏幕截图中想要查找的对象上划线。这类似于安卓的“圈选搜索”功能。

![visual intelligence screenshot ios 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/4NThI5wBlR7gAIDcufnKoFH2Er8=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/visual-intelligence-screenshot-ios-26.jpg?lossy)

“划线搜索”允许用户对屏幕截图中的特定对象进行图像搜索，即使图片中包含多个物体。它默认使用 Google 图像搜索，但苹果在主题演讲中展示了该功能与 Etsy 等其他应用的配合使用。应用可能需要添加对该功能的支持。

在某些情况下，视觉智能会自动识别图像中的单个对象，用户无需使用“划线搜索”即可点击。这类似于“照片”应用中的对象识别功能，但它仍然会引导至图像搜索。

### 提问与搜索 (Ask and Search)

如果用户不需要单独识别屏幕截图中的某个对象，可以直接点击“提问”按钮来询问有关所见内容的问题。问题将转达给 ChatGPT，并由 ChatGPT 提供信息。而“搜索”按钮则会向 Google 搜索查询更多信息。

![visual intelligence ios 26 screenshots](https://images.macrumors.com/t/pEh9VW6NBe4Nq9cPQ0JgNYprlEI=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/visual-intelligence-ios-26-screenshots.jpg?lossy)

与标准视觉搜索一样，如果屏幕截图包含事件的日期、时间和相关信息，可以直接将其添加到日历中。

### 新增对象识别类型

苹果虽然没有特别提及，但视觉智能新增了对新类型对象的快速识别支持。除了之前能够提供信息的动物和植物外，它现在还可以识别艺术品、书籍、地标、自然地标和雕塑。

![visual lookup books ios 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FelqdHwmlZ0IhpEBQNg1XngPIYQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/visual-lookup-books-ios-26.jpg?lossy)

如果用户对视觉智能能够识别的对象使用该功能，会弹出一个发光的小图标。点击它会显示有关所见内容的信息。视觉智能的这一方面很棒，因为它适用于实时相机视图或已拍摄的照片。对于使用视觉智能的标准“提问与搜索”请求，用户必须拍照，以便将其转发给 ChatGPT 或 Google 图像搜索等服务。艺术品、书籍、地标、自然地标、雕塑、植物和动物可以在设备上识别，无需联系其他服务。

### 兼容性

视觉智能仅限于支持 Apple Intelligence 的设备，包括 iPhone 15 Pro 型号和 iPhone 16 型号。它通过长按支持相机控制的设备上的相机控制按钮、使用操作按钮或控制中心切换来激活。

### 发布日期

iOS 26 目前正在进行 Beta 测试，将于 9 月向公众发布。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 中的“视觉智能”功能得到显著增强，现在不仅支持相机识别，还能识别屏幕截图内容。新增“划线搜索”功能，允许用户在截图中圈选特定对象进行图像搜索。同时，用户可直接向 ChatGPT 提问或通过 Google 搜索获取信息。视觉智能现可识别艺术品、书籍、地标和雕塑等新对象类型，部分识别可在设备上完成。此功能仅限支持 Apple Intelligence 的 iPhone 15 Pro 及 iPhone 16 系列设备使用，iOS 26 将于 9 月公开发布。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 中视觉智能的新功能
items.content:
Visual Intelligence, an Apple Intelligence feature that Apple introduced last year, has some new capabilities in iOS 26 that make it more useful and better able to compete with the functionality available through some Android smartphones.


Onscreen Awareness


In iOS 18, ‌Visual Intelligence‌ only works with the camera, but in ‌iOS 26‌, it also works with what's on your device. You can capture a screenshot of what's on your screen and then use ‌Visual Intelligence‌ on it to identify what you're looking at, find images, and get more information through ChatGPT.

How to Get Use Onscreen Awareness for Visual Intelligence


‌Visual Intelligence‌ for screenshots works about the same as ‌Visual Intelligence‌ with the camera app, but it's located in the screenshot interface. Take a screenshot (hold down the volume up button and the side button), and then tap out of the Markup interface if it's showing.

To get out of Markup (which is the default view), tap on the little pen icon at the top of the display. From there, you should see the ‌Visual Intelligence‌ options.

Highlight to Search


With Highlight to Search for ‌Visual Intelligence‌ onscreen content awareness, you can use a finger to draw over the object in the screenshot that you want to look up. It's similar to Android's Circle to Search feature.


Highlight to Search lets you conduct an image search for a specific object in a screenshot, even if there are multiple things in the picture. It uses Google Image search by default, but Apple showed off the feature working with other apps like Etsy during its keynote event. Apps will likely need to add support for the feature.

In some cases, ‌Visual Intelligence‌ will identify individual objects in an image on its own, and you can tap without needing to use Highlight to Search. This is similar to the object identification feature in the Photos app, but it still leads to an image search.

Ask and Search


If you don't need to isolate one object in your screenshot, you can simply tap on the Ask button to ask questions about what you're seeing. Questions will be relayed to ChatGPT, and ChatGPT will provide the information. The Search button queries Google Search for more information.


As with the standard Visual Search, if your screenshot includes dates, times, and related information for an event, it can be added directly to your calendar.

New Object Identification


Apple didn't mention it, but ‌Visual Intelligence‌ adds support for quick identification of new types of objects. It can now identify art, books, landmarks, natural landmarks, and sculptures, in addition to the animals and plants it was able to provide information on before.


If you use ‌Visual Intelligence‌ on an object that it is able to recognize, you'll see a small glowing icon pop up. Tapping on it reveals information about what's in view. What's neat about this aspect of ‌Visual Intelligence‌ is that it works with the live camera view or with a snapped photo.

For standard Ask and Search requests using ‌Visual Intelligence‌, you have to take a photo so that it can be relayed to sources like ChatGPT or Google Image Search. Art, books, landmarks, natural landmarks, sculptures, plants, and animals can be identified on-device without contacting another service.

Compatibility


‌Visual Intelligence‌ is limited to devices that support ‌Apple Intelligence‌, which includes the iPhone 15 Pro models and the iPhone 16 models. It is activated by a long press on the Camera Control button on devices that have Camera Control, or using the Action Button or a Control Center toggle.

Launch Date


‌iOS 26‌ is in beta testing right now, but it will launch to the public in September.

items.title: 苹果现已开始销售翻新版M4 MacBook Air机型 (原标题: Apple Now Selling Refurbished M4 MacBook Air Models)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### 苹果开始销售翻新版M4 MacBook Air机型

苹果公司已在美国的翻新产品商店中上架M4 MacBook Air机型，这是自今年早些时候发布以来，最新款MacBook Air设备首次以折扣价提供。

*   **可用型号与配置**
    *   提供13英寸和15英寸两种尺寸的MacBook Air机型。
    *   有多种容量和配置可供选择。
*   **价格与折扣**
    *   翻新设备的折扣约为同等全新机型的15%。
    *   基础款M4 MacBook Air的起售价为849美元，原价为999美元。
*   **库存情况**
    *   翻新库存会随销售和新设备补充而波动。
    *   目前有超过30种配置可供选择，适合等待折扣M4型号的用户。
*   **翻新流程与质量保证**
    *   苹果的翻新Mac产品与全新产品无异。
    *   翻新过程包括：
        *   全面的功能测试。
        *   彻底清洁。
        *   电池更换。
        *   全面检查。
    *   翻新设备享受与新设备相同的福利：
        *   符合AppleCare+的购买资格。
        *   享有相同的14天退货期。
*   **其他翻新M4型号**
    *   翻新版M4 Mac mini和MacBook Pro机型已于2月份开始销售。
    *   翻新版M4 Max和M3 Ultra Mac Studio也于本周早些时候开始提供。

![m4 macbook air pink](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Oq9ZNczpb-yV8MN1q1AkghjHN0E=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/m4-macbook-air-pink.jpeg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已在美国翻新商店推出M4 MacBook Air机型，首次提供折扣价。13英寸和15英寸型号均有售，折扣约15%，基础款起价849美元。这些翻新设备经过全面测试、清洁和电池更换，质量与新品相同，并支持AppleCare+和14天退货。库存会波动，目前有多种配置可选。
items.translated_title: 苹果现已开始销售翻新版M4 MacBook Air机型
items.content:
Apple today added M4 MacBook Air models to its refurbished store in the United States, making the latest ‌MacBook Air‌ devices available at a discounted price for the first time since they launched earlier this year.


Both 13-inch and 15-inch ‌MacBook Air‌ models are available, with Apple offering multiple capacities and configurations. The refurbished devices are discounted by approximately 15 percent compared to equivalent new models. Pricing starts at $849 for the base M4 MacBook Air model, down from $999.

Refurbished stock will fluctuate as Apple sells its current inventory and replaces it with new devices, but there are over 30 options to choose from right now if you've been holding out for a discounted M4 model.

Apple's refurbished Macs are identical to new products. Apple uses a refurbishment process with full functionality testing, thorough cleaning, battery replacement, and inspection. Refurbished devices are eligible for AppleCare+ and have the same 14-day return period as new devices.

Refurbished M4 Mac mini and MacBook Pro models have been available for purchase since February, and Apple began offering refurbished versions of the M4 Max and M3 Ultra Mac Studio earlier this week.
